title: Bug 17801Organize Imports dialog: default button should not be Cancel
EB: Bug 17801Organize Imports dialog: default button should not be Cancel The list should maintain focus like on the first page, and thedefault button should be Finish.Using build F1.
SR: Steps:1) Create file that requires two ambiguous classes (List and ArrayList, forexample)2) Run Organize Imports3) On first page of the dialog, the list has focus, allowingfor easy keyboard selection of the class to use, and default button is next (all good)4) Pressnext5) The list no longer has focus, so can't use arrow keys to select the class to use, and thedefault button is Cancel (all bad).
